Html:
Since I recognize that there are many people having trouble with the SampleCamCalib project that comes with ALVAR distribution, I will add a tool in Goblin XNA that performs the camera calibration and generates the calib.xml file in the next release.

Ohan

i'm creating tutorial for generating calib.xml

http://azerdark.wordpress.com/2010/09/13/how-to-generating-calib-xml-using-alvar/

i hope it'll help :D

That's cool!!

I'll be creating a C# version so that it will be no longer necessary to build ALVAR for Goblin XNA, and simply use their dlls. 

Ohan
